name: Basic vs. Pro Navigation Bar Tutorial using Icon Animations
description:
This is an activity booklet. Go through the basic steps of setting up a navbar prototype using interactive components and smart-animate. You'll need to do the activities to get the prototype to run perfectly.


For a more guided walkthrough, check out the accompanying YouTube video


Or you can also reach out to me on Instagram @mudaexperience


Anyway, happy building


- ✌️Izzy
